participant_1.background:
Others get to see a happy, healthy me on my days off.
i start an internship in engineering later this year.
I am passionate about fighting for what is right, even if it means putting my neck on the line.
i used to be a lawyer.
i have a wife and two kids.

participant_2.background:
I work long hours in the sun and my eyes get tired.
i have red hair.
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.
I am passionate about fighting for what is right, even if it means putting my neck on the line.
I love to grow sunflowers.

content.text: I love spending time with my family, fighting for what is right, and growing sunflowers!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend time with my family, fighting for what is right, and doing engineering things!
What kind of engineering things do you like to do?
I like to design buildings and bridges.
That sounds really cool! I like to build things out of wood and metal.
That's awesome! I like to do that too.
We should get together and build something sometime!
That would be so much fun!
Great! I'll bring the wood and metal, and you can bring the design!
